select RELATION_NO, RELATION_TYPE, ENTITY_ID, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_ENGLISHNAME, CORP_NAME,CORP_CRED_TYPE, CORP_CRED_ID, CORP_CRED_VALIDITY, CORP_GENDER, CORP_COUNTYR, CORP_ALIAS_NAME,CORP_BIRTHDAY, CORP_PROFESSION, CORP_TELEPHONE_NUMBER, CORP_ADDRESS, COMPANY_COUNTYR,COMPANY_REGISTERED_ADDRESS, COMPANY_ID_TYPE, COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_ACCOUNTANT,COMPANY_DESCRIPTION, REGISTERED_CAPITAL, COMPANY_SIZE, POSTCODE, COMPANY_FAX, OPERATOR_NAME, OPERATOR_TYPE, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_VALIDITY, OPERATOR_TELEPHONE_NUMBER, OPERATOR_ADDRESS,BANK_ACCOUNT, BANK_NAME, CUS_STATE, SALESMAN_ID, CHANNEL, VERIFY_STAT,DATA_STATE,EMAIL, LINKPHONE, CTID_EDT,OPERATOR_START_VALIDITY,CTID_START_VALIDITY ,CTID_END_VALIDITY from TB_COMPANY_INFO where CORP_CRED_ID =#corpCredId:VARCHAR#

and DATA_STATE = '1'
